dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Hello, what brings you to this forest?

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The forest has been plagued by a dark force. The villagers have gone missing.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I see. What can I do to help?

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: There's an ancient temple deep within the forest where the source of the darkness resides.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I'm on my way to the temple. Wish me luck!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: May the road rise up to meet you...
